jsx.ui.box
Class MessageBox

java.lang.Object

                              jsx.ui.box.MessageBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnPopup, OnRender, OnStyle
public class MessageBox
extends Dialog

A base class for message box dialog.

A message box is the simplest dialog.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Detail

MessageBox

public MessageBox(java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String message)

Typically constructs a message box.

This constructor invokes its super constructor with the specified title text and adds the given message text to the content box.

Parameters:
title - The title text for the message box.
message - The message text for the content box.
Since:
1.0
